post.description: Adds a new soil type to the system.

get.description: Retrieves all soil types with optional filtering, sorting, and paging. Sort by any field using SortBy. Prefix with '-' for descending, '+' or no prefix for ascending. Example: '-name' for descending by name.

delete.description: Deletes an existing soil type identified by its ID.

get.description: Retrieves a specific soil type by its ID.

patch.description: Updates the name of an existing soil type identified by its ID.

post.description: Adds a new soil formula to the system.

get.description: Retrieves all soil formulas with optional filtering, sorting, and paging. Filter by name or soil type IDs (formulas must contain ALL specified soil types). Sort by 'name', 'id', or 'itemcount'. Prefix with '-' for descending, '+' or no prefix for ascending. Example: '-name' for descending by name, 'itemcount' for ascending by number of items.

delete.description: Deletes an existing soil formula identified by its ID.

get.description: Retrieves a specific soil formula by its ID.

patch.description: Updates an existing soil formula identified by its ID.

post.description: Creates a new project for the specified user and container.

get.description: Retrieves all projects with optional filtering, sorting, and paging. Filter by userId and/or isPublished. Sort by 'createdat' or 'id'. Prefix with '-' for descending, '+' or no prefix for ascending. Example: '-createdat' for descending by creation date.

post.summary: Adds an item to a project.
post.description: Adds a plant, decoration, or soil item to a project canvas with position coordinates. User must be the owner.

delete.summary: Deletes a project by its ID.
delete.description: Deletes a project by its ID. User must be the owner. Returns 204 No Content if successful.

get.description: Retrieves a project by its ID with all items.

patch.description: Updates an existing project's preview image.

post.description: Marks a project as published. User must be the owner.

delete.summary: Removes an item from a project.
delete.description: Removes an item from a project canvas. User must be the owner. Returns 204 No Content if successful.

patch.description: Updates the position coordinates of an item on the project canvas. User must be the owner.

post.description: Marks a project as not published. User must be the owner.

get.description: Retrieves all plants with optional filtering, sorting, and paging. Filter by name. Sort by 'name', 'namelatin' or 'id'. Prefix with '-' for descending, '+' or no prefix for ascending. Example: '-name' for descending by name, 'name' for ascending by name.

delete.summary: Deletes a plant by its ID.
delete.description: Deletes a plant by its ID. Returns 204 No Content if the deletion is successful, or 400 Bad Request if the request is invalid.

get.description: Retrieves a plant by its ID.

patch.description: Updates an existing plant with the provided details.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all plant humidity levels.
Retrieves a list of all plant humidity levels.
Retrieves a list of all plant item sizes.
Retrieves a list of all plant light levels.
Retrieves a list of all plant water needs.

Retrieves all decorations with optional filtering, sorting, and paging. Filter by name. Sort by 'name' or 'id'. Prefix with '-' for descending, '+' or no prefix for ascending. Example: '-name' for descending by name, 'name' for ascending by name.

delete.summary: Deletes a decoration by its ID.
delete.description: Deletes a decoration by its ID. Returns 204 No Content if the deletion is successful, or 400 Bad Request if the request is invalid.

get.description: Retrieves a decoration by its ID.

patch.description: Updates an existing decoration identified by its ID.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all decoration categories.

Retrieves all containers with optional filtering, sorting, and paging. Filter by name. Sort by 'name', 'id', or 'volume'. Prefix with '-' for descending, '+' or no prefix for ascending. Example: '-name' for descending by name, 'volume' for ascending by volume.

delete.description: Deletes a container by its ID.

get.description: Retrieves a container by its ID.
